about_the_game:
Enjoy hundreds of puzzle games from the comfort of your PC!

Take your puzzle-solving skills to the next level with the Puzzle Summit: Color Sort Difficulty Expansion Pack! This pack introduces brand-new difficulty levels—Medium, Hard, and Expert—designed to test your cognitive abilities and push you to new heights in Color Sort puzzles.

Whether you’re a casual puzzle solver or a seasoned pro looking for a challenge, these new levels will keep your mind sharp and engaged for hours.

Expansion Pack Features:

  • New Difficulty Levels – Master Medium, Hard, and Expert challenges.

  • Hundreds of New Puzzles – Unique and captivating levels to keep you engaged.

  • Train Your Brain – Strengthen focus, memory, and problem-solving skills.

  • Unlock a Sense of Calm – Enjoy the meditative flow of solving intricate puzzles.

  • Hints & Clues – Get help when you need it without breaking the challenge.

  • Earn Rewards – Collect in-game achievements as you conquer harder levels.

Never Get Bored:

Challenge yourself and prove your expertise in these new levels; Puzzle Summit: Color Sort Difficulty Expansion Pack. You can't get bored here! Puzzle Summit: Solve & Rise is a brain training program that improves your mind’s focus, memory, processing speed, and more.

Never-Ending Fun For Everyone:

Immerse yourself in the never-ending fun of Puzzle Summit: Color Sort Difficulty Expansion Pack, where your journey to mental mastery is accompanied by a sense of calm and accomplishment. Embrace the thrill of solving mind-boggling puzzles, boost your cognitive skills, and unlock a world of endless possibilities. Your mind holds the key to unlocking these limitless possibilities – let the flow of puzzles and clever challenges elevate you to new heights. Unlock new difficulty levels!
